price: 159. Ya sôló ba oyo bazali kobomba maye tokitisaki kowuta na polele mpe bokambi na sima ya kolakisa polele na yango mpona bato okati ya buku, bango nde bakozua botutu ya Allah, mpe balakeli bakolakela bango botutu.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكۡتُمُونَ مَآ أَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلۡبَيِّنَٰتِ وَٱلۡهُدَىٰ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا بَيَّنَّٰهُ لِلنَّاسِ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ يَلۡعَنُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَيَلۡعَنُهُمُ ٱللَّٰعِنُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yaktumūna mā anzalnā mina al-bayināti wal-hudā min baʿdi mā bayyannāhu lilnnāsi fī al-kitābi ulāika yalʿanuhumu al-lahu wayalʿanuhumu al-lāʿinūna
